description: Housed in the Villa Fiorella Art Hotel, this restaurant boasts a stunningly located terrace with spectacular views of the Bay of Naples and its islands. The cuisine pays tribute to Campania and its top-quality ingredients which the chef uses to create imaginative dishes reinterpreted with his own personal twist.
